t: Last of the Amazons | Steven Pressfield
s: March 8, 2018 - The only book I’ve written (so far) in which the narrator is a woman. A story of the legendary female warriors who fought on horseback with the bow and the pelekus, the double-bladed throwing axe. Their war cry, it was said, turned men's knees to jelly.
